text: Theodore "Blue" Edwards (born October 31, 1965) is a retired American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball Association (NBA). Edwards played ten years in the league. == Other websites == *Blue Edwards NBA statistics Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:African-American basketball players Category:American basketball players Category:Boston Celtics players Category:Miami Heat players Category:Milwaukee Bucks players Category:Shooting guards Category:Small forwards Category:Sportspeople from North Carolina Category:Sportspeople from Washington, D.C. title: Blue Edwards
